title: 3 drug peddlers arrested : over 1 kg ice recovered
content:
Dera Ismail Khan, Sep 09 (APP):Dera police during ongoing anti drug campaign arrested three more drug peddlers and recovered ice and heroin from the possession of the arrested persons in the limits of Dera Town and Cantt police stations on Saturday.
According to the police spokesman, On the direction of Regional Police Officer Dera Nasir Mehmood Satti under the command of District Police Officer Dera Abdul Rauf Babar Qaisrani, police team of Dera Town police station under the supervision of SHO Faheem Abbas arrested two drug peddlers.
The accused have been identified as Kamran son of Abdul Qayyum resident of Daraban Kalan and Khalidullah son of Amir Shah resident of Tiken.
The police claimed to have recovered 660 grams of ice, and 230 grams of heroin from their possession. While SHO Cantt Gul Sher Khan arrested one accused and recovered 532 grams of ice from his possession.
Dera police registered separate cases against the arrested criminals and started further investigation.
